trim.if: AND ( cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_EMAIL LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{q},'%')) OR cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_PHONE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{q},'%')) OR cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{q},'%')) OR cuCustomerInfo.REAL_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{q},'%')) )

mapper.select:
SELECT cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_ID "id", cuCustomerInfo.COUNTRY_ID "countryId", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_NUMBER "customerNumber", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_NAME "customerName", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_HEAD "customerHead", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_PHONE "customerPhone", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_ALIPAY "customerAlipay", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_WECHAT "customerWechat", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_EMAIL "customerEmail", cuCustomerInfo.REAL_NAME "realName", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_CARD "customerCard", cuCustomerInfo.BANK_CARD "bankCard", cuCustomerInfo.BANK_NAME "bankName", cuCustomerInfo.FLAG_AUTH "flagAuth", cuCustomerInfo.FLAG_TRADE "flagTrade", cuCustomerInfo.FLAG_SPECIAL "flagSpecial", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_STATUS "customerStatus", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_FREEZE_CONTEXT "customerFreezeContext", cuCustomerInfo.REGISTER_TIME "registerTime", cuCustomerInfo.VERSION_NUM "versionNum", cuCustomerInfo.FLAG_DEL "flagDel", cuCustomerInfo.CREATE_TIME "createTime", cuCustomerInfo.CREATE_USER "createUser", cuCustomerInfo.MODIFY_USER "modifyUser", cuCustomerInfo.MODIFY_TIME "modifyTime" FROM cu_customer_info cuCustomerInfo
ORDER BY ${orderBy}

SELECT cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_ID "id", cuCustomerInfo.COUNTRY_ID "countryId", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_NUMBER "customerNumber", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_NAME "customerName", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_HEAD "customerHead", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_PHONE "customerPhone", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_ALIPAY "customerAlipay", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_WECHAT "customerWechat", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_EMAIL "customerEmail", cuCustomerInfo.REAL_NAME "realName", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_CARD "customerCard", cuCustomerInfo.BANK_CARD "bankCard", cuCustomerInfo.FLAG_TRADE "flagTrade", cuCustomerInfo.FLAG_SPECIAL "flagSpecial", cuCustomerInfo.BANK_NAME "bankName", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_STATUS "customerStatus", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_FREEZE_CONTEXT "customerFreezeContext", cuCustomerInfo.REGISTER_TIME "registerTime", cuCustomerAccount.USE_MONEY "useMoney", cuCustomerAccount.LOCK_MONEY "lockMoney", cuCustomerAccount.USE_COIN "useCoin", cuCustomerAccount.LOCK_COIN "lockCoin", cuCustomerAccount.CUSTOMER_INTEGRAL "customerIntegral", cuCustomerAccount.CUSTOMER_PURSE "customerPurse", cuCustomerAccount.TRADE_COIN "tradeCoin", cuCustomerAccount.RATE_NUM "rateNum", cuCustomerCount.SALF_NUM "salfNum", cuCustomerCount.TEAM_NUM "teamNum", cuCustomerCount.FLAG_LEVEL_AUTO "flagLevelAuto", sysCustomerLevel.LEVEL_NAME "customerLevelName", country.COUNTRY_NUM "countryNum", refereeCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_NAME "refereeName", refereeCustomerInfo.REAL_NAME "refereeRealName", refereeCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_PHONE "refereePhone" FROM cu_customer_info cuCustomerInfo LEFT OUTER JOIN cu_customer_account cuCustomerAccount ON cuCustomerAccount.CUSTOMER_ID = cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN cu_customer_count cuCustomerCount ON cuCustomerCount.COUNT_ID = cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_customer_level sysCustomerLevel ON cuCustomerCount.CUSTOMER_LEVEL_ID = sysCustomerLevel.LEVEL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN cu_customer_referee cuCustomerReferee ON cuCustomerReferee.CUSTOMER_ID = cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN cu_customer_info refereeCustomerInfo ON refereeCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_ID = cuCustomerReferee.REFEREE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_country country ON country.COUNTRY_ID = cuCustomerInfo.COUNTRY_ID
ORDER BY ${orderBy}

SELECT cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_ID "id", cuCustomerInfo.COUNTRY_ID "countryId", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_NUMBER "customerNumber", cuCustomerInfo.MNC_COIN "mncCoin", cuCustomerInfo.MP "mp", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_NAME "customerName", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_HEAD "customerHead", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_PHONE "customerPhone", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_ALIPAY "customerAlipay", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_WECHAT "customerWechat", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_EMAIL "customerEmail", cuCustomerInfo.REAL_NAME "realName", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_CARD "customerCard", cuCustomerInfo.BANK_CARD "bankCard", cuCustomerInfo.BANK_NAME "bankName", cuCustomerInfo.FLAG_AUTH "flagAuth", cuCustomerInfo.FLAG_TRADE "flagTrade", cuCustomerInfo.FLAG_SPECIAL "flagSpecial", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_STATUS "customerStatus", cuCustomerInfo.CUSTOMER_FREEZE_CONTEXT "customerFreezeContext", cuCustomerInfo.REGISTER_TIME "registerTime", cuCustomerInfo.VERSION_NUM "versionNum", cuCustomerInfo.FLAG_DEL "flagDel", cuCustomerInfo.CREATE_TIME "createTime", cuCustomerInfo.CREATE_USER "createUser", cuCustomerInfo.MODIFY_USER "modifyUser", cuCustomerInfo.MODIFY_TIME "modifyTime" FROM cu_customer_info cuCustomerInfo
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
